keypoints: Updated Makefile variable TEST_DB_DIR to /var/tmp/test_db

task_signature: fix: resolve galera injection error (error 14) and add health checks
keypoints: Set innodb_flush_method = O_DSYNC to fix WSL2/bind-mount filesystem errors
Added tmpfs for /tmp in docker-compose.yml to speed up temp table operations

Verified target row counts (300k employees, 2.8M salaries) after internal container injection
reasoning: The ERROR 14 on WSL2 is caused by InnoDB's O_DIRECT failing on certain Windows-hosted bind mounts during rapid file expansion; switching to O_DSYNC and using internal container storage for injection resolves this bottleneck.
